participant_1.background:
I am passionate about cooking and enjoy sharing my creations with my family.
my hair is black.
i have never done drugs because i do not know where to buy them.
i am afraid of the dark.
I don't own a car because I like to walk or ride my bike.

participant_2.background:
My video game collection is my most valued material possession because it reminds me of the good times I had playing games with my family and friends.
i volunteer walking dogs twice a week.
i have been acting since i was ten years old.
I have a job that allows me to work from home so I can spend more time with my family.
my temper is pretty short.

content.text: I'm doing well, thank you for asking! And yourself?
I'm doing great, thanks! I'm really passionate about cooking and enjoy sharing my creations with my family. What are you passionate about?
I'm passionate about acting! I have been acting since I was ten years old, and I love the feeling of being someone else and telling stories.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to try acting, but I'm too afraid of getting on stage.
Don't be afraid! It's so much fun! And you're never too old to start.
I might have to give it a try sometime. Thanks for the encouragement!
You're welcome! What do you do for work?
I'm a stay-at-home mom, but I love it! I get to spend all day with my kids and cook them delicious meals.
That sounds like a great job! I'm jealous. I have a job that allows me to work from home, but it's not as fun as cooking.
I'm sure your job is important! And you get to spend time with your family, which is great.
Yeah, I guess it is. Thanks!
No problem! I'm glad we had this conversation.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone new.
